question: Which Indian Institute placed in the top 100 universities in the Times Higher Education's World Reputation Rankings 2018?
explanation: Indian Institute of Science (IISc) in Bengaluru has made it to the top 100 universities in the Times Higher Education's World Reputation Rankings 2018. Ranked in the 91-100 band, it is the only Indian institution to make it to the prestigious list this year. The list topped by American universities Harvard, MIT & Stanford, with the United Kingdom's Cambridge & Oxford completing the top 5.
